get.description:
This resource describes the attributes associated with brewing. This resource is used for configuration only. Operation is handled independently of this resource. The amount requested is in ml. The strength of a brewed drink is an integer, the range of which may be enforced by the presence of a strengthrange Property.
Retrieves the state of brewing.

strength.description: The strength of a brewed drink.

precision.description: Accuracy granularity of the exposed value

value.description: The value sensed or actuated by this Resource

range.description: The valid range for the value Property

step.description: Step value across the defined range

id.description: Instance ID of this specific resource

if.description: The interface set supported by this resource
